properties.entry: SELECT RES_NO , RES_NAME , CEO , PERMIT_NO , ADDRESS , D_ADDRESS , LOCAL_CT , DLOCAL_CT , PHONE , CELLPHONE , EMAIL , PARKING , STATUS , LONGTITUDE , LATITUDE , R_IMG , OPEN , CLOSE , BREAK_S , BREAK_E , FOOD_CT FROM RESTAURANT WHERE RES_NO=? AND USER_PWD=? AND STATUS IN ('Y', 'C')
UPDATE RESTAURANT SET USER_PWD = ? , STATUS = 'Y' WHERE RES_NO = ?
UPDATE RESTAURANT SET OPEN = ? , CLOSE = ? , BREAK_S = ? , BREAK_E = ? WHERE RES_NO = ?

SELECT RES_NO , RES_NAME , CEO , PERMIT_NO , ADDRESS , D_ADDRESS , LOCAL_CT , DLOCAL_CT , PHONE , CELLPHONE , EMAIL , PARKING , STATUS , LONGTITUDE , LATITUDE , R_IMG , OPEN , CLOSE , BREAK_S , BREAK_E , FOOD_CT FROM RESTAURANT WHERE RES_NO=? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MENU ( MENU_NO , RES_NO , MENU_NAME , PRICE , MENU_DES , M_IMG ) VALUES ( SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
SELECT RES_NO , MENU_NO , MENU_NAME , PRICE , MENU_DES , M_IMG FROM MENU WHERE RES_NO=? ORDER BY MENU_NO
UPDATE MENU SET MENU_NAME = ? , PRICE = ? , MENU_DES = ? , M_IMG = ? WHERE MENU_NO = ?
UPDATE RESTAURANT SET ADDRESS = ? , D_ADDRESS = ? , PHONE = ? , CELLPHONE = ? , EMAIL = ? , PARKING = ? , R_IMG = ? , OPEN = ? , CLOSE = ? , BREAK_S = ? , BREAK_E = ? , FOOD_CT = ? WHERE RES_NO = ?
DELETE FROM MENU WHERE MENU_NO = ?

SELECT Q_NO , CATEGORY , Q_TITLE , USER_ID , Q.STATUS , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "CREATE_DATE" FROM QUESTION Q JOIN TB_USER ON (Q_PERSON=USER_NO) WHERE A_PERSON = ? ORDER BY Q.STATUS, CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT Q_NO , CATEGORY , Q_TITLE , USER_ID , Q.STATUS , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "CREATE_DATE" , Q_CONTENT , A_CONTENT FROM QUESTION Q JOIN TB_USER ON (Q_PERSON=USER_NO) WHERE Q_NO = ?
UPDATE QUESTION SET MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE , A_DATE = SYSDATE , STATUS = 'Y' , A_CONTENT = ? WHERE Q_NO = ?

SELECT REVIEW_NO , USER_ID , REVIEW_CONTENT , STAR , BOOK_NO , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "CREATE_DATE" , GOOD FROM REVIEW JOIN TB_USER USING (USER_NO) WHERE RES_NO = ? ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC

SELECT REVIEW_NO , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "CREATE_DATE" , REVIEW_CONTENT FROM REVIEW WHERE RES_NO = ? AND GOOD = 'N' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT FILE_NO , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_BNO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT BOOK_NO , TO_CHAR(BOOK_A, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "BOOK_A" , BOOK_NAME , BOOK_DATE , BOOK_TIME , STATUS
FROM BOOK WHERE RES_NO = ? ORDER BY BOOK_NO DESC
